EmailTemplate.name: Manchester Event Test PG
EmailTemplate.subject: Manchester Test Event
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please join us for drinks and canapés in the stunningly beautiful surroundings of The Rates Hall. ____
Thursday 14 November 2013 6.00pm – 9.00pm The Rates Hall, Manchester Town Hall Extension ____
Please RSVP by Thursday 7 November, or contact Lyndsey Warrington with any queries. http://www.360ingenuity.com/aecom/events/confirmation.html lyndsey.warrington@aecom.com
You are receiving this communication because we value you as a key client, partner or supplier to AECOM. If you would prefer not to receive updates from us, please click here to request that we unsubscribe you immediately from our list. mailto:lyndsey.warrington@aecom.com?subject=UNSUBSCRIBE
AECOM, MidCity Place, 71 High Holborn, London, United Kingdom, WC1V 6QS.
